channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Under lock and key: How ballots get from Pennsylvania precincts to election offices
item.description: Pennsylvania election officials take a variety of measures to secure ballots when they are transported from polling places to county facilities.

item.title: US agency ends investigation into Ford engine failures after recall and warranty extension
item.description: U.S. auto safety regulators have ended an investigation into Ford engine failures after the company replaced engines or extended the warranty on some vehicles.

item.title: State oil regulator requests $100 million to tackle West Texas well blowouts
item.description: Unable to keep up with the growing number of leaking and erupting wells in the state’s oil fields, the Texas Railroad Commission, which regulates the state’s oil and gas industry, has asked lawmakers for an additional $100 million in emergency funding — which would be equal to about 44% of the agenc
